name: Hood Runner
description:
A lot of things happen in the depths of the old, mysterious forest. One of them is our game.

Are you ready for the challenge?

Do you have the reflex necassary in order to survive?

Are you able to reclaim what once belonged to you?

Do you think you'll be able to keep up with the white wolf?

Endless runner blurs the boundary between art and games by combining what's the best of each of them.
All deployed graphics and sounds were created manually and brought to life for our players by a team of young developers.
Project was realized due to curiculum of "Game Dev School". We decided to create endless runner with the most artistic approach possible.

Thanks to that idea we may, now, present you with:
- dynamic gameplay,
- handmade assets,
- humor,
and it's all nicely wrapped in estethic graphics.

Made using Defold Engine.

Team:

Dariusz Ruta - programming, VFX

Emilia Szyszka - art

Szymon Wawruch - design, sound

Agata Marchewa - design

Łukasz Jagodziński - programming
